attributes.review: So I met this app freshman year when he was a senior. Because I was an impressionable, easy to manipulate kid, I agreed to go on some dates with him. Long story short, this app had been cheating on me for the entire duration of our relationship. To break up with me, this app said that he was going to University of Phoenix and would have to move to Arizona. I found out later that day from my mother that University of phoenix is an online school. In conclusion, this app is a no good bum who will take it vantage of you despite your age/experience and feel no remorse for it when he screws you over.
attributes.title: Heartbreaking ğŸ˜–

attributes.review: So i was walking home in the middle of the night (keep in mind it was 10 am) and i got jump by the cheeto man! He took my Cheetos as well as me. Then he started flossing in front of me. Then he got my pet gecko and forced it to tell the big cheeto man how to save 15% or more on car insurance. Then he took my geckos mega pods and put them on. He was listening to some Asian songs on his mega pixel 3 as he did renegade on tik tok. Then he practiced the cheeto ritual! He then proceeded to tell me to take a bath in hot cheeto water. It was pretty nice dont get me wrong but then u wont believe what happened next! Follow and like to see part 2!!!

attributes.review: When I got this app I was really excited! I thought I would get to meet the Cheeto of my dreams. I got this idea from the Cheetos commercials that are always playing. Unfortunately this was not the case. When I first opened the app I was disappointed to find that the only thing on it was a singular depressed Cheeto that was trying to pretend to be a cheddar ruffles potato chip. I tried to close the app many times thinking this was a glitch but sadly the more I did this the worse it got. Overall this app has made me loose my motivation to find the perfect Cheeto for me :â€™(
attributes.title: Not what I expected
